review.title: “awful”
review.pros: Pros – close to home, supposedly flexible working hours, good salary
review.cons: Cons – as manager, always working public holidays and sundays with no extra hourly rate or overtime, poor marketing meant business very slow to build, poor staff training
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Interesting”
review.pros: Pros – Working at BIG W provided me with a rich multicultural experience. Lots of growth opportunities.
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes the routine gets dull and extremely boring.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Motivation sessions should be held for employees.

review.title: “The big w brand.”
review.pros: Pros – large company, good brand, reasonably secure.
review.cons: Cons – work extremely hard for not very much money, and you will not be appreciated for your hard work, you are just another number.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – should learn to look after your good staff, so they will stay and actually treat them like human beings and not a number.
